scripts.watch: yarn clean && mkdir dist && cp -R static dist/static && cp manifest.json dist/ && parcel watch src/{records.html,options.html,background.js} -t node -d dist/src/ --public-url ./
scripts.build: yarn clean && parcel build src/{records.html,options.html,background.js} -d dist/src/ --public-url ./ && cp -R static dist/static && cp manifest.json dist/
